CMP-P-PROJECT-SPEECH-KEY.name: cmp-p-project-speech

PCY-P-PROJECT-SPEECH-ADMINS.name: pcy-p-project-speech-admins

statements: allow group grp-p-project-speech-admins to manage ai-service-speech-family in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-projects:cmp-p-project-speech

allow group grp-p-project-speech-admins to use tag-namespaces in tenancy
